name: RIFF VR for Arcades
description: RIFF VR for arcades allows everyone to become a VR rockstar. Its levels of difficulty, leaderboards, customization mode, interactive environments, and rock solid song selection is a crowd pleaser!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better. Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: i7 Memory: 9 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
